comments:
TPTP driver: TPTP-4.3.0-200610010100

1) Start Eclipse TPTP
2) Look in the error log

Problem: there are a number of errors about muse and wsdm.

This is happening because the Muse JARs have not been added to the install. The particular bundle (org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.wsdm.muse.notification) should be used only after the Muse JARs have been isntalled. This will be reflected in the tech preview download documentation.
